title: How to reset your password
content: To reset your password, click on 'Forgot Password' at the login page, and follow the instructions sent to your email.

title: Troubleshooting network issues
content: If you're having network issues, first check if your router is powered on. Try restarting it. If the issue persists, contact support.

title: Installing software on Ubuntu
content: To install software on Ubuntu, you can use the apt package manager. Run 'sudo apt update' followed by 'sudo apt install <package_name>'.
